name: Newton's Fractal
description:
Controls

Drag - pan around / move roots
Scroll - zoom in / zoom out
Ctrl - precise zoom while scrolling
Double click - add a new root where clicked

Features

Create beautiful fractals and explore their intricate details.

Create a Newton's fractal by moving around points which are roots of a polynomial equation.

See complex fractal shapes transform in real time before your eyes.

Pan and zoom to examine details and find interesting compositions.
